p:
Safety and regulatory issues need to be fully addressed.
54 For nanomaterials, it is not possible to evaluate the impacts on humans and the environment based only on the chemical characteristics.
55 Toxicity studies with nanocelluloses on mouse and human macrophages have been conducted by Vartiainen et al., who suggested that CNF prepared from friction grinding is not cytotoxic.
103 Pitk√§nen et al. found that CNF did not present genotoxicity or sublethal effects in in vitro tests but concluded that additional studies are needed to exclude possible genotoxic activity.
104
